organizations: Ministry of Immigration, Integration and Housing
title: New Ministry on F2 Cloud
text: New Ministry on F2 Cloud ET | Source: cBrain A/S multilang-release The Ministry of Immigration, Integration and Housing has signed an agreement with cBrain to deliver F2 case and document management. F2 will be delivered as a cloud service (SaaS) from the F2 Cloud Center at the Danish Agency for Governmental IT services (Statens IT). This is an important agreement for cBrain as it supports cBrains position as vendor of cloud services for the Danish Central Government. The new agreement is based on the Danish national cloud frame agreement called SKI 02.19 ASP/Cloud SaaS. Per Tejs Knudsen, CEO Anne Dorthe Hermansen, ir@cbrain.dk, + 45 40118608 Related Articles
